title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: Influence is the power to effect and control, manipulate something and we have two great players in the person of Cristiano Ronaldo and Leo Messi who have dominated football for almost two decades now, the two players are influential in their own way but who has the most influence, in my opinion I will say it's Ronaldo because he has a larger fan base that follows and love home genuinely, abdy secondly the CR7 brand which he has created for himself, Ronaldo went to Saudi Arabia a core Muslim state and we know the Muslims as people very strick when it comes to their laws but some laws was amended in favour of Cristiano Ronaldo that's influence, and any club he goes to the number 7 jersey of that club is automatically his, that's influence too, like I said Messi is influential in his own way too.

comments.author: puloweh555
comments.body: Both of them were able to get to this point, apart from their skills, also because of their extraordinary love for their profession as footballers and of course extraordinary hard work. In short, they both really perpetuate their lives for the game of football. People who really understand football will respect both of them without comparison.There were many great footballers before them (Messi & C. Ronaldo), but the consistency of the two at the highest level will be difficult for any player to match.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Both two of the greatest soccer players in history. I think it’s impossible to separate them, they’ve been the two greatest players in the world for 20 years. I just don’t think you can separate them. Let’s just appreciate that we got to witness their genius.
